description.plain: Austin Carter Mahone (born April 4, 1996) from San Antonio, Texas, is an American pop singer who became popular in 2011 due to viral videos of his performances. He is of Irish-American ancestry. Mahone was chosen as one of the Opening Acts of Taylor Swift’s Red Tour and Bridgit Mendler’s Summer Tour with selected dates

body.plain: Austin Carter Mahone (born April 4, 1996) from San Antonio, Texas, is an American pop singer who became popular in 2011 due to viral videos of his performances. He is of Irish-American ancestry. Mahone was chosen as one of the Opening Acts of Taylor Swift’s Red Tour and Bridgit Mendler’s Summer Tour with selected dates

songs.full_title: All I Ever Need by Austin Mahone
songs.title: All I Ever Need

description.plain: All I Ever Need is the sixth track on Austin’s debut EP “The Secret.” It is one of the more mellow songs on his EP, which is mainly upbeat pop music.

songs.embed_content: Read “All I Ever Need” by Austin Mahone on Genius

album.full_title: The Secret (Japan Edition) by Austin Mahone
album.name: The Secret (Japan Edition)

annotatable.link_title: All I Ever Need by Austin Mahone
annotatable.title: All I Ever Need

body.plain: All I Ever Need is the sixth track on Austin’s debut EP “The Secret.” It is one of the more mellow songs on his EP, which is mainly upbeat pop music.

songs.lyrics:
24 ContributorsAll I Ever Need Lyrics[Verse 1]
Don't the water grow the trees?
Don't the moon pull the tide?
Don't the stars light the sky
Like you need to light my life?
If you need me anytime
You know I'm always right by your side
And see, I've never felt this love
You're the only thing that's on my mind

[Pre-Chorus]
You don't understand how much you really mean to me
I need you in my life, you're my necessity, yeah
But believe me, you're everything that just makes my world complete
My love is clear, the only thing that I'll ever see
[Chorus]
You're all I ever need
Baby, you're amazing
You're my angel, come and save me
Oh
You're all I ever need
Baby, you're amazing
You're my angel, come and save me
Oh

[Verse 2]
Don't the water grow the trees?
Don't the moon pull the tide?
Don't the stars light the sky
Like you need to light my life?
We can do anything you like
I know we both can get it right tonight
You got your walls built up high
I can tell by looking in your eyes

[Pre-Chorus]
You don't understand how much you really mean to me
I need you in my life, you're my necessity, yeah
But believe me, you're everything that just makes my world complete
My love is clear, the only thing that I'll ever see
You might also like[Chorus]
You're all I ever need
Baby, you're amazing
You're my angel, come and save me
Oh
You're all I ever need
Baby, you're amazing
You're my angel, come and save me
Oh

[Verse 3]
When it comes to you, baby, I'm addicted
You're like a drug, no rehab can fix it
I think you're perfect, baby, even with your flaws
You ask what I like about you, ooh, I love it all
When it comes to you, baby, I'm addicted
You're like a drug, no rehab can fix it
I think you're perfect, baby, even with your flaws
You ask what I like about you, ooh, I love it all

[Chorus]
You're all I ever need (All I ever need)
Baby, you're amazing
You're my angel, come and save me
Oh
You're all I ever need
Baby, you're amazing (Amazing)
You're my angel, come and save me (Save me)
Oh47Embed

songs.full_title: Mmm Yeah by Austin Mahone (Ft. Pitbull)
songs.title: Mmm Yeah

description.plain:
Austin Mahone tag teamed with Pitbull releasing, Mmm Yeah.

The single is about Mahone calling out a crush from afar which left his fans in tears!

https://twitter.com/AustyLicious/statuses/426690702521552896

songs.lyrics:
30 ContributorsMmm Yeah Lyrics[Verse 1: Pitbull]
Austin M, keep doing your thing
Let these boys keep slippin', man
I'm not into gymnastics

I tell these women that it's all about a team

So do you want join the team?
Now tell me, Little Miss Thang

She looked so fine, I just had to speak
I asked her name, but she turned away

But this one hit me hard in some kind of place, like, man
